title: Roam Men's Mid Rise Relaxed Straight Leg Jeans
description: EVERYDAY DENIM: At General Denim Works, we craft high-quality, stylish straight leg men's jeans that are comfortable and durable. Roam is a classic deep brushed jeans for men, designed in a relaxed fit that’s roomy but never slouchy. Featuring a bar tack stitch detail in a contrasting color, they offer effortless style every day.

FROM WORK TO PLAY: Our Relaxed Straight Leg Roam men jeans offer unmatched comfort with soft, breathable fabric that feels great all day long. These mens relaxed fit jeans are made from mid-weight, durable cotton denim you can count on. With the perfect amount of stretch for comfort and a smooth hand feel, these timeless stretchy jeans for men are designed to last for years.

EASY CARE: Our mens pants relaxed fit are as low-maintenance as they are stylish. These straight fit jeans for men can be machine washed—just turn them inside out and wash with similar colors to keep your straight leg jeans for men looking their best.

A NEW CLASSIC: Founded in 2020, GDW combines expert design, comfort, and affordability, offering denim jeans for men that complement their life and style. Simply put, we make straight leg jeans men love to wear.

PREMIUM QUALITY FABRIC: Crafted with 86% cotton, 12% PES, and 2% EA, these work pants for men are breathable and stretch-friendly. Designed for everyday comfort and timeless style, these mens jeans relaxed fit make a versatile addition to any wardrobe.
